faq-page.3: How can I send the sound of my phone from the headphones
faq-page.7: Our headphones connect to your device via bluetooth or cable. Then you can use it to send and receive sound. If you have any problems, you can contact us.
faq-page.8: When you want to make voice calls and listen to music on your phone, you can choose bluetooth headphones and direct your sounds to them.
faq-page.9: Our speaker is easily charged with a USB cable. Just put the cable between the speaker and a power source, if possible, you can charge it from your computer.
faq-page.10: Not every keyboard is water resistant. But our keyboards are water and dust resistant. It gives you a longer time of comfortable use.
faq-page.11: Our keyboards are equipped with a wide range of language support. If your language is not available, please contact us. We will work to add a new language.
